content: अर्वाचीन {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [अर्वाच्-ख] {@--1@} Turned towards; favouring. {@--2@} Being on this side, below. {@--3@} Born afterwards, posterior. {@--4@} Modern, recent. {@--5@} Reverse, contrary; °ता state of being posterior or recent; state of being contrary. --नं {%<ab>ind.</ab>%} (With <ab>abl.</ab>) {@--1@} On this side of. {@--2@} Thenceforward. {@--3@} Less than. {@--4@} Later than; यदूर्ध्वं पृथिव्या अर्वाचीनमंतरीक्षात् <ls>Śat. Br.</ls>
